channel.description: Recent content in time on Daksh's Blog

item.title: What to do with empty time
item.description: One will inevitably encounter several times a week the sensation of empty time; time where it seems nothing productive can be done. Here I’m going to tell you how to wisely use that time to your advantage. First things first, we must sort out the problem. Time where you have tasks left to do but you can’t accomplish any of them can be classified as Type 1 Empty Time, and time when you have no tasks left can be classified as Type 2 Empty Time.
